text: Futhi abesifazane abahlukanisile kufanele balinde kuze kuphele izinyanga ezintathu (bengashadi okwesibili), futhi akusiwona umthetho kubona ukufihla lokho uMvelinqangi akudalile esizalweni sabo uma bekholwa kuMvelinqangi kanye nososukwini lokugcina, futhi abayeni babo banamalungelo okubabuyisela emumva kulesisi (sikhathi) uma befuna ukubuyelana. Futhi okwabo (abesifazane) kufana nalokho okulindelekile kubona mayelana nokuhle. Futhi amadoda (abayeni babo) bangaphezu kwabo ngezinga. Futhi uMvelinqangi uphakeme ngamandla unobuhlakani
